casebody.data:
Michelle WILLIAMS
v.
STATE of Connecticut Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 5, 2019

David V. DeRosa, in support of the petition.

Edward P. Brady III and Catherine M. Blair, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 189 Conn. App. 172, 206 A.3d 779 (2019), is denied.
